about_the_game:
Epic Quest is a singleplayer game stylized after classic 8-bit JRPG games of the 1980s.

You take on the role of a descendant of a legendary hero of of the old ages, who once liberated the world from the dreaded Lord of Antisexuality. Many years have passed, and the threat has returned! Your mission is to defeat the Disciple of Antisexuality, who just like his late master is also planning to enslave the whole land. Through his power many fearsome creatures began to surface, terrorizing the people.

You have a large world to explore, full of many interesting places, a ton of items and non-playable characters whose advice you'll be needing to progress in the game. You'll be fighting a variety of monsters, differing from place to place. You'll also be able to recruit mercenaries who will aid you in your battles, and may prove essential to taking down the main villain.

Try not to get lost in gradually more complicated dungeons and explore them thoroughly, so you won't miss any available help. At the very end, engage in battle against the terrifying Disciple of Antisexuality and ensure he will share his even more horrible master's fate!

This game offers:

  • Stylized 8-bit graphics and soundtrack!
  • Gameplay reminiscent of classic JRPG games!
  • A large, open world to explore!
  • Lots of enemies!
  • A feel of adventure!
  • Many interesting locale!
  • A terrifying final boss!
